entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Stony Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:20 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -26.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stony Rapids Airport 2:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -26.7°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -31.0°C
Wind: WNW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
